kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Get Webelements
kw.doc: Returns list of [http://selenium-python.readthedocs.io/api.html#module-selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement|WebElement] objects matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Length Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the length of the given item is correct.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//android.widget.TextView[@resource-id="de.danoeh.antennapod.debug:id/txtvTitle" and @text="Can the Knicks force game 7?"]' text is 'Can the Knicks force game 7?'
xpath criteria: //android.widget.TextView[@resource-id="de.danoeh.antennapod.debug:id/txtvTitle" and @text="Can the Knicks force game 7?"]
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Run Process
kw.msg: Starting process: adb shell "pm clear de.danoeh.antennapod.debug"
kw.doc: Runs a process and waits for it to complete.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
